MetaData.Name: PHIN MESSAGING SPECIFICATION for CASE NOTIFICATION v3.0 without value sets Adjusted with Date Strings[clone]
MetaData.OrgName: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

Constraint.Description: If CWE.1 (Identifier) is valued then CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) shall not be empty.
If CWE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CWE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD]]'.
( TS.1 (Time) shall not be all 9s, AND TS.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'. )
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
HD.3 (Universal ID Type) shall contain the value 'ISO'.
If TS.1 (Time) is valued then TS.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
The value SHALL follow the Date/Time pattern 'HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]'.
( TS.1 (Time) shall not be all 9s, AND TS.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]][+/-ZZZZ]]'. )
If CE.4 (Alternate Identifier) is valued then CE.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) shall not be empty.
If CE.1 (Identifier) is not valued then CE.2 (Text) shall not be empty.
If CE.1 (Identifier) is valued then CE.3 (Name of Coding System) shall not be empty.
If SN.1 (Comparator) is valued then SN.1 (Comparator) shall contain one of the following values: '<=', '>=', '<>', '<', '>', '='.
If ( SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) is valued OR SN.4 (Num2) is valued ) then SN.2 (Num1) shall not be empty.
If SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) is valued then SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) shall contain one of the of the following values: '+', '-', '/', '.', ':'.
If ( SN.2 (Num1) is valued AND SN.4 (Num2) is valued ) then SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) shall not be empty.

If OBX-11 (Observation Result Status) does not contain the value 'X', then OBX-2 (Value Type) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['AD','CE','CF','CP','CQ','CWE','CX','DR','DT','DTM','ED','FT','MO','NM','RP','SN','ST','TM','TS','TX','XAD','XCN','XON','XPN','XTN'].
The second occurrence of PID-5.7 (Name Type Code) shall contain the value 'S'.
The first occurrence of PID-5.7 (Name Type Code) shall be empty.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) shall contain the value '1'.
The first occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['NOTF_ORU_v3.0','SUMM_ORU_v3.0','ENVNTF_ORU_v3.0','NOTF_ORU_3.1'].
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) shall contain the value '^~\&'.

If The first occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) contains one of the values in the list: ['NOTF_ORU_v3.0','NOTF_ORU_v3.1'], then The second occurrence of MSH-21.1 (Entity Identifier) shall contain the value 'Generic_MMG_V2.0'.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) shall contain the value 'R01'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) shall contain the value 'ORU'.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) shall contain the value 'ORU_R01'.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) shall contain the value '|'.
If MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) is valued then MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) should contain the value 'NE'.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) shall contain the value '2.5.1'.
If MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) is valued then MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) should contain the value 'AL'.
If SPM-11.1 (Identifier) contains the value 'G', then SPM-13 (Grouped Specimen Count) shall not be empty.
If OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) contains the value '1', then OBR-4.1 (Identifier) shall contain the value '68991-9'.
If OBR-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '68991-9', then The first occurrence of OBR-31.1 (Identifier) shall not be empty.
If OBR-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '68991-9', then OBR-25 (Result Status) shall contain one of the values in the list: ['F','C','X'].
If OBR-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '68991-9', then ( OBR-7.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]][+/-ZZZZ]]', AND OBR-7.1 (Time) shall not be all 9s. )
If OBR-11 (Specimen Action Code) contains the value 'G', then ( OBR-26.1.1 (Identifier) should not be empty, AND OBR-29.1.1 (Entity Identifier) should not be empty. )
If OBR-4.1 (Identifier) contains the value '68991-9', then ( OBR-22.1 (Time) shall follow the date/time pattern 'YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]][+/-ZZZZ]]', AND OBR-22.1 (Time) shall not be all 9s. )
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
PATIENT_RESULT.ORDER_OBSERVATION.OBSERVATION.OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) shall be valued sequentially starting with the value '1'.
